Game.Name: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX 3 (USA, Europe)
Game.plot: The BMX pros come out to play on the GBA in this exclusive version of the two-wheeler series. Choose from the best riders from around the world, or create your own BMX rider, and take them around a collection of tracks in an attempt to become to greatest rider of them all.Challenges range from simply gaining a certain amount of points by making tricks, collecting items hidden around the level or knocking over certain items to trigger events to collecting prize money, which can be spent on improving your players stats as well as buying better bikes and new gear.Cheat: Unlock Metal and FlashAt the title screen, press R button, R button, L button, L button, B button, B button, L button and R button. Once you type the code correct you will hear a sound.
Game.Notes: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX 3 is the sequel to the revolutionary Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX 2 for the Game Boy Advance. It's all about big air, grinding rails, riding ramps, jumping gaps and pulling the SICKEST tricks imaginable, all in the palm of your hand. Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX 3 offers 1000+ tricks and four modes of gameplay.
